storyInfo: Thorns resumes his repair work on the compass. The crew flees towards the reef, not knowing what the future holds. Back at town, Silver, who had given his entire life to Aar√≥n, was judged by a resurrected Anastasio as having developed desires he should not have, and is executed.

attributes.content: The sun sets. The crew shivers in the cold night of the Salt Flat.
They had to practically turn the battered ship upside down to find an old pot and some even older dried fin.
The pot begins to emit a sliver of warmth, with the help of Weedy's bionic seadragon.
It's so cold... we've used up the wood we scraped up. Leaf will have to do as a makeshift brazier for now.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: It was only designed for warming hands, though. This is the best I can manage in terms of cooking.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Getting something warm to eat is more than enough!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: We don't have much in the way of food or water. Enough to last us two or three days at most.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: We have sacks for gathering rainwater, but... the weather on the Salt Flat is unreliable at the best of times.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Couldn't we make use of the steam outside?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: It's unsafe for drinking. It carries microorganisms from deep underground.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I could distill it.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Focus on fixing the compass first.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Anyway, our priority now should be finding a way to last through the night.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Night on the Flat is no joke. We're low on food, and we've got injuries. Get too cold in your sleep, and you might never wake up.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: R-Really? It could be over, just like that?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: What if we run into a saltfin...?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: It'll be fine! I can use my expertise to send it a message, telling it that we're here and to prepare to die!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ...How can you be so absolutely awful at reading the mood?
attributes.name: Pascuala
Weedy
attributes.content: You learn to live with it... He's the only one who could run his mouth in a situation like this...

attributes.name: Weedy
attributes.content: Look out!
La Conquista runs over a bone and gives a violent jolt, sending the pot flying with the food inside.
Elysium leaps out to catch it, but screams as it burns his hands.
Isidro steps forward and thrusts his sword through the handles of the pot, saving their dinner.
The heat from the bionic seadragon has dissipated.
The heating function just broke... Give me a second. I'll fix it.
attributes.name: Weedy
Pascuala
attributes.content: Brr... ugh... it's so cold...

attributes.name: Pascuala
attributes.content: Achoo!
I can synthesize something that emits heat. It shouldn't take too long.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Save the materials for the compass. I'll worry about the heat.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Achoo! Achoo!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: I'm sorry, c-can I have a little more blanket? I'm really freezing...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Stop worrying about whose is whose! Everybody, huddle up! Isidro, stop sulking over there and get in here!
attributes.name: Teach
Elysium
attributes.content: Count your lucky stars you get to snuggle up to a once-in-a-lifetime hottie like me...

attributes.name: Elysium
attributes.content: Hey! Who threw a blanket over my head?
Juana blocks the opening with her body. Teach helps Pascuala wrap herself tight, with only her face peeking out, grimacing from the cold.
Elysium and Weedy are struggling to move their stiff fingers to pick up the food and put it in their mouths.
Isidro wants to go back to the transmutation table, but realizes that his frozen fingers are of no use when he picks up the probe.
La Conquista sails aimlessly with the wind.
Brr... where are we going?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: No idea. Deeper in, I suppose.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: So we don't know where we're going...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: We don't know when those finshit preachers will catch up to us...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: And we don't even know if I'll freeze to death in my sleep, or if the ship will hit something again...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: What's gotten into her?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I thought she'd be the first to find the warmest spot to lie down, maybe steal our blankets when we're asleep.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: She's just a child.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: She's asleep, with a bit of fever. See if she has any useful herbs in her pocket.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: If I'm gonna die here... I wanna sleep in my old home... one last time...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: That big house... my bed, my blankets, my bathtub...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: My prettiest clothes, all lined up...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: All the food I can eat... all the money I can spend... no more getting kicked out...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Getting kicked hurts so bad... rolling from one end of the street to the other... I just wanna go home...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Wanna live a better life...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Don't wanna die... not here...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Weedy. I didn't think it'd be so dangerous. I really shouldn't have brought you here.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. I came to help.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: If we make it back to Rhodes Island in one piece, I'll give you a month's worth of pay, I promise!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Heh, no need for that... Go to sleep, we can talk in the morning...
attributes.name: Weedy
Elysium
attributes.content: Okay...

attributes.name: Elysium
attributes.content: Thorns? What're you up to?
Fixing the compass, otherwise we'll never make it out of Skeletal Reef.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: The way the ship's shaking, I need to build an Arts field of sufficient complexity to stabilize the Corazonix. Otherwise, the entire compass could fall apart the moment I try to disassemble it.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: And even if such a field is possible, I'll need a steady hand to carry out the rematerialization process properly...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: The slightest trembling when etching the liquid Originium circuit into the Corazonix could ruin the whole material...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Plus, when tomorrow comes, I'm not sure if we could...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: It's no surprise he's tired. He's been learning the helm on the fly all day. He's never done anything like this before, has he?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: ...No, his training was in communications.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Get closer. The temperature's still dropping. It'll be warmer if we huddle up.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Perlita, do you want to...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Se√±ora...
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: ...Pap√° said you used to sail the seas... Is it really blue?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Pap√°... will you take me to see it? When I grow up... I want to sail the sea...
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Perlita, you...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Juana had told that story while holding young Teach in her arms, so very long ago.
She places a hand on Teach's forehead. There are wrinkles on it now.
Teach has a fever too, Isidro. Do you have any herbs left?
attributes.name: Juana
Isidro
attributes.content: Let me see...

attributes.name: Isidro
attributes.content: Here.
In the quiet cabin, the sound of rustling punctuates the low breathing of the sleeping. Isidro places both pot and rack on top of the repaired bionic seadragon and prepares to boil the herbs.
Juana gazes at the barebones interior of the cabin with soft eyes, seemingly recalling sweet memories.
She puts the herbs into the pot. They make a soft, splashing sound, rocking along with the ship.
Have you ever seen the sea, Isidro?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Waters bluer than the sky, waves foaming white, lightning striking from the clouds that seem like they would cut you in two...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Will you sail out to sea with us, Isidro?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: You'd make a good captain.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Juana's eyes glow in the darkness. Cold starlight shines in through the ship's frame.
He opens his mouth to answer, but closes it again without a sound.
There is a light in the horizon, in the direction of where they came from. It is their pursuers.
Canvas, finhide, wood, relics of the Golden Age...
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: But virtually no food or water. You were desperate.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: It always takes such dire straits for man to understand the value of order.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: ...Maybe.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Subservience to order has brought you food, water, and shelter. Do not forget this.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: ...My mates understand parley. They'll keep to the agreement.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Very good. You will make a fine privateer.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: One who answers to me.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Log the confiscated supplies. Record the names of the bandits, then bring them to the abandoned houses on the edge of the town.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Take care not to draw the townsfolks' attention.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: And I want those ships of theirs that traverse the Salt Flat to be brought back without a scratch. They are the town's only hope.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Understood, Se√±or Silver.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Anything else?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: We...
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: We tried looking for the Alguacil, but found only a fragment of his clothing. I left it on your desk.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: I will take it from here. Now go. I wish to be alone for a while.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Anastasio, Anastasio...
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: I thought you would save us all.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: But you never cared for anything other than yourself, did you?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: The piece of cloth leaves soot on the desk that he had kept so pristine. Silver picks it up with two fingers and stares at it.
Finally, he throws it into the fireplace, and starts wiping the desk clean.
The same way he climbs the clock tower every day, gazing upon this town that has survived calamity both natural and man-made.
You don't care about this country, this town, or these people. That's why you'll never understand.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: From the most prosperous harbor to the poorest fishing village, every settlement in Iberia that survived the sea went on to collapse in the chaos that followed.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Aar√≥n was no exception. I am the one who devoted half my life to this place, who saved it from the tragedy of cannibalism and the terrors of tyranny...
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: And I am the one who will bring it salt ships that walk the land, who will liberate it from this barren soil.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: All you can see, Anastasio, is your stubborn, archaic faith.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: You will never belong to Aar√≥n. You will never interfere with Aar√≥n again.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: ...My Aar√≥n.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Legs driven by wind power through a complex transmission system...
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: So they were never meant to be landships at all. A wind-powered walker... genius.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: A shame. That √Ügir woman had such talent...
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: A handful of new ships, plus the ones confiscated from the pirates, will be enough to carry the entire population of Aar√≥n.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: It's been decades... Finally, we will be free of this Salt Flat that feeds no one.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Where did that sudden wind come from?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: ...What is going on?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Is this house really that drafty? I couldn't even light a fire.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: A few small tiny sparks fly out from the end of the match, only to be extinguished in an instant.
A tiny flame sways in the wind, the flickering light illuminating the darkness.
His eyes begin to adjust and take in his surroundings.
He sees a face. Skin pale as salt, punctuated by red-brown blood stains. Wet hair hanging feebly off the head like entrails.
The face of a dead man.
You... you...
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: No one could have survived that explosion...
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: How did you do it? What are you?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: On our first meeting, I was wounded walking the Flat on foot to reach Aar√≥n.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: You asked if I needed help.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: At the time, you thirsted for nothing more than to aid me.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Now? When you halted the clerics coming to my aid, when you gleefully imagined my death... what was it you sought?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: You were also corrupted by desire just like the others, no?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Not a word comes out of Silver. He grabs at the air as he collapses, but only manages to pull out the drawer.
Flower petals pour out, covering him in them.
Dried flowers, rotted flowers, flowers that had turned to dust. Flowers from a few years ago, from a decade ago, from decades ago.
The flowers that the townsfolk had offered to their calificador in gratitude over the years, all pour down upon him.
...Flowers?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.text: He hears the sound of a knife being honed, before it comes to a sudden stop.
There is a commotion outside. His mother screams, screeching and beseeching, claiming that she was honing it to cut vegetables.
He had not seen vegetables in the house for a long time.

attributes.content: You are safe, child.
attributes.name: Inquisition Cleric

attributes.content: Madness has come over your mother, but we have her under control.
attributes.name: Inquisition Cleric

attributes.content: By the lantern... what is that he's eating?
attributes.name: Inquisition Cleric

attributes.content: No! No!!!
attributes.name: Young Anastasio

attributes.text: He screams hysterically like his mother, waving his hands wildly, trying to cover his own face.
Fearing that the clerics would smell the flesh, see the scraps by his mouth.
He had been determined to end his sinful existence by death. Why, then, as he comes face to face with this kindly man of the cloth, would he strive to hide his crime?

attributes.content: I have sinned... please, let me die...
attributes.name: Young Anastasio

attributes.content: No, child. I will not judge you for trying to survive.
attributes.name: Inquisition Cleric

attributes.content: You must live and atone for your sins.
attributes.name: Inquisition Cleric

attributes.content: Sinners are myriad. We have walked the land helping those who could not atone themselves, and cleansing them of their sins.
attributes.name: Inquisition Cleric

attributes.content: This you can do also. Only by this will you atone for your own sins.
attributes.name: Inquisition Cleric

attributes.content: Until one day, the purest flower will bloom at your touch.
attributes.name: Inquisition Cleric
